text: Mata ware wa mūsā ni (rippō o sazukeru kikan to shite) 30 yoru o yakusoku shitaga, sarani 10 (yoru) o kuwaeta. Sorede omo ga sadame rareta kigen wa 40 yoru to natta. Mūsā wa, kyōdai no hārūn ni itta. `Anata wa watashi ni kawatte hitobito o tōchi shi nasai. Tadashiku kōdō shi, aku o okonau mono no michi ni shitagatte wa naranai
